DOC.brief_summary: Research show well-developed icon pictorial aid comprehension medication information effective improving patient ' medication management . This experimental study seek test effect icon structure medication information subject ' process recall simulate medication instruction computer test environment . The study plan enroll 200 subject .
DOC.brief_title: PictureRx : An Intervention Reduce Latino Health Disparities ( Supplement : Medical Icons )
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year old Fluency English Spanish Manage prescription medicine , Be take least one chronic medication Too ill complete experiment Having visual acuity worse 20/50 via Rosenbaum Visual Acuity exam ( eyechart ) Inability communicate either Spanish English Overt psychiatric illness , overt delirium dementia
